amendment.description: An amendment numbered 17 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to increase funding for the Department of Energy's Fossil Energy and Carbon Management program by $8,750,000 while reducing funding for Departmental Administration by $8,750,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
